Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1800–1900 A.D.
Description: Large trade cards from the "Song Birds of the World" series (N42), issued in 1890 in a set of 50 cards to promote Allen & Ginter brand cigarettes. Series N42 reproduces the cards from N23 in a larger size.
